00012 namespace webkit {
00013 class CookieManagerProxy;
00014 
00015 class CookieManager {
00016     private:
00017         CookieManager() {
00018         }
00019         virtual ~CookieManager();
00020 
00021     public:
00030         static CookieManager * getInstance();
00031 
00032         /* Control whether cookie is enabled or disabled </summary>
00033          * <param name="accept"> TRUE if accept cookie </param>
00034          */
00035         void setAcceptCookie(bool accept);
00036 
00037         /* Return whether cookie is enabled
00038          * <returns> TRUE if accept cookie </returns>
00039          */
00040         bool acceptCookie();
00041 
00042         /* Set cookie for a given url. The old cookie with same host/path/name will
00043          * be removed. The new cookie will be added if it is not expired or it does
00044          * not have expiration which implies it is session cookie.
00045          * <param name="url"> The url which cookie is set for </param>
00046          * <param name="value"> The value for set-cookie: in http response header </param>
00047          */
00048         void setCookie(const ::gaia::base::String & url,
00049                 const ::gaia::base::String & value);
00050 
00051         /* Get cookie(s) for a given url so that it can be set to "cookie:" in http
00052          * request header.
00053          * <param name="url"> The url needs cookie </param>
00054          * <returns> The cookies in the format of NAME=VALUE [; NAME=VALUE] </returns>
00055          */
00056         ::gaia::base::String getCookie(const ::gaia::base::String& url);
00057 
00058         // Remove all session cookies, which are cookies without expiration date
00059         void removeSessionCookie();
00060 
00061         // Remove all cookies
00062         void removeAllCookie();
00063 
00067         bool hasCookies();
00068 
00072         void removeExpiredCookie();
00073 
00074         static bool allowFileSchemeCookies();
00075 
00076         static void setAcceptFileSchemeCookies(bool accept);
00077 
00078     private:
00079         static CookieManagerProxy* mspcCookieManagerProxy;
00080         static CookieManager* mspcSdkInstance;
00081 };
